activities: Personal information is collected from clients in the provision of moving and relocation services.  Personal information is also collected internally from employees for human resource purposes, including but not limited to the administration of benefits, payroll, etc.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Sirva offers the independent alternative dispute resolution services of the American Arbitration Association (AAA) for all complaints involving the collection of non-human resource data.  Sirva agrees to cooperate with the E.U. Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) for complaints involving the collection of human resource data.
